presentation.title: Enjoy a relaxing stay in Sierras Chicas
presentation.text: Just a few minutes from the international airport, you will find this rustic-style retreat in Villa Allende, a small city at only 20 minutes form Cordoba the capital. Air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom offer comfort and tranquility. Ideal if you are planning a quiet stay alone or in a small group with friends or family. You will enjoy a delicious breakfast and you will have exclusive access to the swimming pool and barbecue grill. Our strategic location puts you close to many points of interest while you immerse yourself in the natural beauty of trees, flowers and the chirping of birds. Book now and find a home away from home in Villa Allende.
